title: Wolverine: (Issues 313-317) (Trade Paperback)
description: Martial arts, super science, and sorcery! How is Wolverine connected to the secret society known as the Covenant? As Logan battles the Murderous Lion in a no-holds barred kung-fu throwdown, Melita uncovers the Covenant’s secrets. Who is the Dreaming Maiden, and why does the mysterious Covenant want her dead? Wolverine teams with monster-hunter Elsa Bloodstone and discovers the Floating Castle — but with the Covenant hot on their trail, can Wolverine keep the Dreaming Maiden alive, or is she too dangerous to be saved? As Logan faces nightmares both while asleep and while awake, Melita makes a discovery that will change Wolverine — and her — forever! Collecting WOLVERINE (1988) #314-317.
